name: Banana Loaf
desc: After many request by my friends....

Instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 C. Grease and line a small loaf pan with baking paper.
Cream the butter and sugar and add the vanilla essence.
Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Sift together the dry ingredients and add to the egg mixture.
Lastly, mash the bananas with a fork and add.
blend well and turn the mixture into the pan. Bake for 1 hour or until done.
